reviews.title: Great rooms
reviews.text: Similar Quality as a HI Express but 2/3 the price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like other reviewers we found the KC Motel through Tripadvisor recommendations. Mr Bhakta, the manager and possibly the owner, had everything ready for us in the office so it was just a case of a credit card then walking into our twin bed, non-smoking room which appeared to have everything we needed for a night's stay in Show Low.
reviews.title: Great Place: Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided not to avail ourselves of the dining delights of the town but instead drove down a fairly busy highway to a Saveway store which had, to our amazement, a small selection of kosher food. With the microwave in our room and our own plates and plastic flatware we had all we needed to make a good hot meal after a long day on the road.
reviews.title: A Great Place to Stay

likes.liked: — Large, clean room, nice amendities, and everything in the room worked.

reviews.title: Highly Recomended
reviews.text: We may miss out on KC Motel's breakfast though; I find the colour of Fruit Hoops a trifle garish in the morning!
Don't waste money staying at the HI Express across the street: stay at the KC Motel if you are ever driving through Show Low
reviews.title: Agree with other reviewers

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Show Low, AZ: KC Motel - "A Great Place to Stay"
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.text: Very nice and extremely clean room. Our room was beautifully decorated. People kind and helpful.
reviews.title: Sweet Room, Sweet People

reviews.text: We stay at this hotel six or seven times a year when we go to Show Low for business. Consistently clean, nicely decorated, friendly staff. Highly Recommend
reviews.title: Best Deal In Show Low
A great deal on basic lodging
reviews.text: I stayed at KC Hotel after reading the other posts, and find myself in agreement.
Clean, neat, the rooms are not so cookie-cutter as in a chain. Mine had some decorative china arranged on a shelf above my bed.
reviews.title: Best Kept Secret For Now
Accomodations and Personnel
reviews.text: My room was small and lacked the advertised microwave, but I don't mind either. I think most of the other rooms are larger than mine.
